content: For auction is a very nice vintage piece The piece for auction is a LEALANA .10BTC Buyer funded black released in 2013Marked buyer funded / Unfunded For auction is one of the early LEALANA silver pieces. A wonderfully vintage LEALANA .10BTC bf black. This is a shimmering quarter troy oz of silver with a bright serialized hologram. Assembled and released by LEALANA in 2013. Carefully removed from its vintage airtight for macro photos of the silver surface and hologram. These are some of the best photos ever produced of this particular type of coin and denomination. The piece ships in it's original air-Tite holder placed inside an Eclipse branded box. Piece comes with its full public key. Â Lot 1: #1816, stunning condition The full proceeds of this auction directly support my research and deployment of cutting-edge systems and peripheral technology in the physical cryptocurrency sector. By bidding liberally on this listing, you are invariably pumping your own bags.
